title: Obama Tries To Spread State Of The Union Messages Outside Speech
teaser: This year, the many of the policy initiatives in President Obama's State of the Union address have been anything but closely guarded secrets. The president has previewed several proposals in the days leading up to the speech. And media consumers now have more options than ever for taking in the speech.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
